about.description:
The IGWN Alert System (LVAlert) is a prototype notification service
built on Apache Kafka, using the publish-subscribe (pubsub) protocol.
It is a higher-level modification of [SCIMMA](https://scimma.org/)’s
[hop-client](https://hop-client.readthedocs.io/) to streamline
receiving and responding to alerts from
[GraceDB](https://gracedb.ligo.org).

The IGWN Alert System (LVAlert) is a prototype notification service
built on Apache Kafka, using the publish-subscribe (pubsub) protocol.
It is a higher-level modification of [SCIMMA](https://scimma.org/)’s
[hop-client](https://hop-client.readthedocs.io/) to streamline
receiving and responding to alerts from
[GraceDB](https://gracedb.ligo.org).

name: igwn-alert

new_version_errors.0.2.0:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '0.2.0' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/igwn-alert-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "igwn-alert" %}
{% set version = "0.2.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/igwn-alert-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8a5226285a36f4ae045e2bb2b2dfcf8215283c1a88aa34fde5eaf7963a0fba53
  patches:
    # remove setuptools requirement
    # (since conda build doesn't use pkg_resources for entry points)
    - requirements.patch
    # fix hardcoded version number in test
    - test-version.patch

build:
  entry_points:
    - igwn-alert=igwn_alert.tool:main
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.6
    - setuptools
  run:
    - hop-client 0.6.0.*
    - python >=3.6
    - python-confluent-kafka >=1.7.0
    - safe-netrc

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest
  commands:
    # check requirements
    - python -m pip check
    # run test suite
    - python -m pytest --pyargs igwn_alert.tests -ra -v
    # check entry points
    - igwn-alert --help

about:
  home: https://igwn-alert.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/igwn-alert/
  doc_url: https://igwn-alert.readthedocs.io/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: IGWN Alert Network
  description: |
    The IGWN Alert System (LVAlert) is a prototype notification service
    built on Apache Kafka, using the publish-subscribe (pubsub) protocol.
    It is a higher-level modification of [SCIMMA](https://scimma.org/)’s
    [hop-client](https://hop-client.readthedocs.io/) to streamline
    receiving and responding to alerts from
    [GraceDB](https://gracedb.ligo.org).

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - aepace
    - duncanmmacleod
